hyperparameters.name: n_neighbors
hyperparameters.short_desc: Number of neighbors to use by default for kneighbors queries.

hyperparameters.name: weights
hyperparameters.short_desc: Weight function used in prediction that determines how the points are weighted

hyperparameters.name: leaf_size
hyperparameters.short_desc: the number of leaves used in construction for either ball_tree or kd_tree
